home.content:
# DOM
---
Welcome to lecture 12! This class was taught by Daniel. Here is the link to the resource on **[Github](https://github.com/dannersy/lessons/tree/master/dom)**.

#### AGENDA
---


- Warmup: 5 mins
- Review
- What is the DOM?
- What does it mean to us and why is it useful?
- Differences between ELEMENTS and TEXT NODES
- Create, append & remove elements
- Get, traverse & manipulate element
- Getters VS Setters
- AT SOME POINT, when it feels right, tie in Thurs concepts to DOM manipulation.

desc.content: Introduction to DOM manipulation w/vanilla JS
